name: meet
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: meet
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to see and talk to someone for the first time

example.eg: They met at work.
example.egtrans: 他们是在工作时认识的。

example.eg: I met her in Hawaii.
example.egtrans: 我在夏威夷认识了她。

example.eg: Would you like to meet my sister?
example.egtrans: 你愿意认识一下我姐姐吗？

example.eg: Come and meet (= be introduced to) my friend Laura.
example.egtrans: 来，认识一下我的朋友劳拉。

dsense.name: meet
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to come together with someone intentionally

example.eg: Lorraine and I meet for lunch once a month.
example.egtrans: 我和洛兰每月见一次面吃午饭。

example.eg: We agreed to meet on Tuesday to discuss the project.
example.egtrans: 我们同意星期二见面讨论这一项目。

example.eg: The children's club meets every Thursday afternoon.
example.egtrans: 儿童俱乐部每星期四下午集合。

example.eg: They're meeting with their advisers to draw up a new plan.
example.egtrans: 他们正与顾问会面来制订一项新计划。

example.eg: The president met the UK prime minister in London yesterday.
example.egtrans: 总统昨天在伦敦和英国首相会了面。

trans_examp.trans_en: to come together with someone without intending to

example.eg: It's always awkward when you meet someone you know but you can't remember their name.
example.egtrans: 遇到你认识的人但却记不起他们的名字总会让人很尴尬。

example.eg: Guess who I met in town today.
example.egtrans: 猜猜今天我在城里遇到了谁。

example.eg: We met our old neighbours at an auction last Saturday.
example.egtrans: 我们在上周六的拍卖会上遇到了老邻居。

dsense.name: meet
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: The workers' demands for higher pay were not met by the management.
example.egtrans: 管理层没有满足工人们增加工资的要求。

example.eg: We haven't yet been able to find a house that meets our needs/requirements.
example.egtrans: 我们还没能找到符合我们需要／要求的房子。

example.eg: They will only agree to sign the contract if certain conditions are met.
example.egtrans: 只有某些条件得到了满足，他们才会同意签合同。

example.eg: Do you think we will be able to meet our deadline/target?
example.egtrans: 你认为我们能如期完成／达到目标吗？

example.eg: The company has agreed to meet all our expenses.
example.egtrans: 公司已同意支付我们所有的费用。

dsense.name: meet
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to wait at a place for someone or something to arrive

example.eg: Will you meet me at the airport (= be there when the aircraft arrives)?
example.egtrans: 你到机场接我好吗？

dsense.name: meet
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: There's a large crack where the ceiling meets the wall.
example.egtrans: 天花板与墙壁相连的地方有个大裂缝。

example.eg: The curtains don't quite meet.
example.egtrans: 窗帘拉不太拢。

example.eg: The horizon is the line where the sky meets the earth.
example.egtrans: 地平线是天地相连的那条线。

dsense.name: meet
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: I've never met that kind of problem/system before.
example.egtrans: 我以前从没遇到过那种问题／制度。

example.eg: He met his death (= he died) in the icy waters of the South Atlantic.
example.egtrans: 他死于南大西洋冰冷的海水中。

name: meet
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

example.eg: a track/swim meet
example.egtrans: 田径运动会／游泳比赛

example.eg: the first meet of the season
example.egtrans: 本赛季的第一场比赛

trans_examp.trans_en: an occasion when people go fox hunting
